trans-unit.source: Configure proxy and firewall settings for Operational Insights
trans-unit.target: Configure proxy and firewall settings for Operational Insights

trans-unit.source: Learn about the proxy and firewall settings that you need to configure for the type of agent that you use with Operational Insights
trans-unit.target: Learn about the proxy and firewall settings that you need to configure for the type of agent that you use with Operational Insights

trans-unit.source: Actions needed to configure proxy and firewall settings for Operational Insights differ when you use Operations Manager and it’s agents versus Microsoft Monitoring Agents that connect directly to servers.
trans-unit.target: Actions needed to configure proxy and firewall settings for Operational Insights differ when you use Operations Manager and it’s agents versus Microsoft Monitoring Agents that connect directly to servers.

trans-unit.source: Review the following sections for the type of agent that you use.
trans-unit.target: Review the following sections for the type of agent that you use.

trans-unit.source: For the Microsoft Monitoring Agent to connect to and register with the Operational Insights service, it must have access to the port number of your domains and the URLs.
trans-unit.target: For the Microsoft Monitoring Agent to connect to and register with the Operational Insights service, it must have access to the port number of your domains and the URLs.

trans-unit.source: If you use a proxy server for communication between the agent and the Operational Insights service, you’ll need to ensure that the appropriate resources are accessible.
trans-unit.target: If you use a proxy server for communication between the agent and the Operational Insights service, you’ll need to ensure that the appropriate resources are accessible.

trans-unit.source: If you use a firewall to restrict access to the Internet, you need to configure your firewall to permit access to Operational Insights.
trans-unit.target: If you use a firewall to restrict access to the Internet, you need to configure your firewall to permit access to Operational Insights.

trans-unit.source: The following tables list the ports that Operational Insights needs.
trans-unit.target: The following tables list the ports that Operational Insights needs.

trans-unit.source: Agent Resource
trans-unit.target: Agent Resource

trans-unit.source: Ports
trans-unit.target: Ports

trans-unit.source: *.ods.opinsights.azure.com
trans-unit.target: *.ods.opinsights.azure.com

trans-unit.source: Port 443
trans-unit.target: Port 443

trans-unit.source: *.oms.opinsights.azure.com
trans-unit.target: *.oms.opinsights.azure.com

trans-unit.source: Port 443
trans-unit.target: Port 443

trans-unit.source: ods.systemcenteradvisor.com
trans-unit.target: ods.systemcenteradvisor.com

trans-unit.source: Port 443
trans-unit.target: Port 443

trans-unit.source: .blob.core.windows.net/
trans-unit.target: .blob.core.windows.net/

trans-unit.source: Port 443
trans-unit.target: Port 443

trans-unit.source: You can use the following procedure to configure proxy settings for the Microsoft Monitoring Agent using Control Panel.
trans-unit.target: You can use the following procedure to configure proxy settings for the Microsoft Monitoring Agent using Control Panel.

trans-unit.source: You'll need to use the procedure for each server.
trans-unit.target: You'll need to use the procedure for each server.

trans-unit.source: If you have many servers that you need to configure, you might find it easier to use a script to automate this process.
trans-unit.target: If you have many servers that you need to configure, you might find it easier to use a script to automate this process.

trans-unit.source: If so, see the next procedure To configure proxy settings for the Microsoft Monitoring Agent using a script.
trans-unit.target: If so, see the next procedure To configure proxy settings for the Microsoft Monitoring Agent using a script.

trans-unit.source: Open Control Panel.
trans-unit.target: Open Control Panel.

trans-unit.source: Open Microsoft Monitoring Agent.
trans-unit.target: Open Microsoft Monitoring Agent.

trans-unit.source: Click the Proxy Settings tab.
trans-unit.target: Click the Proxy Settings tab.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>proxy settings tab</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>proxy settings tab</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Select Use a proxy server and type the URL and port number, if one is needed, similar to the example shown.
trans-unit.target: Select Use a proxy server and type the URL and port number, if one is needed, similar to the example shown.

trans-unit.source: If your proxy server requires authentication, type the username and password to access the proxy server.
trans-unit.target: If your proxy server requires authentication, type the username and password to access the proxy server.

trans-unit.source: Use the following procedure to create a PowerShell script that you can run to set the proxy settings for each agent that connects directly to servers.
trans-unit.target: Use the following procedure to create a PowerShell script that you can run to set the proxy settings for each agent that connects directly to servers.

trans-unit.source: Copy the following sample, update it with information specific to your environment, save it with a PS1 file name extension, and then run the script on each computer that connects directly to the Operational Insights service.
trans-unit.target: Copy the following sample, update it with information specific to your environment, save it with a PS1 file name extension, and then run the script on each computer that connects directly to the Operational Insights service.

trans-unit.source: For an Operations Manager management group to connect to and register with the Operational Insights service, it must have access to the port numbers of your domains and URLs.
trans-unit.target: For an Operations Manager management group to connect to and register with the Operational Insights service, it must have access to the port numbers of your domains and URLs.

trans-unit.source: If you use a proxy server for communication between the Operations Manager management server and the Operational Insights service, you’ll need to ensure that the appropriate resources are accessible.
trans-unit.target: If you use a proxy server for communication between the Operations Manager management server and the Operational Insights service, you’ll need to ensure that the appropriate resources are accessible.

trans-unit.source: If you use a firewall to restrict access to the Internet, you need to configure your firewall to permit access to Operational Insights.
trans-unit.target: If you use a firewall to restrict access to the Internet, you need to configure your firewall to permit access to Operational Insights.

trans-unit.source: Even if an Operations Manager management server is not behind a proxy server, it's agents might.
trans-unit.target: Even if an Operations Manager management server is not behind a proxy server, it's agents might.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the proxy server should to be configured the same manner as agents are in order to enable and allow Security and Log Management solution data to get sent to the Operational Insights web service.
trans-unit.target: In this case, the proxy server should to be configured the same manner as agents are in order to enable and allow Security and Log Management solution data to get sent to the Operational Insights web service.

trans-unit.source: In order for Operations Manager agents to communicate with the Operational Insights service, your Operations Manager infrastructure (including agents) should have the correct proxy settings and version.
trans-unit.target: In order for Operations Manager agents to communicate with the Operational Insights service, your Operations Manager infrastructure (including agents) should have the correct proxy settings and version.

trans-unit.source: The proxy setting for agents is specified in the Operations Manager console.
trans-unit.target: The proxy setting for agents is specified in the Operations Manager console.

trans-unit.source: Your version should be one of the of the following:
trans-unit.target: Your version should be one of the of the following:

trans-unit.source: Operations Manager 2012 SP1 Update Rollup 7 or later
trans-unit.target: Operations Manager 2012 SP1 Update Rollup 7 or later

trans-unit.source: Operations Manager 2012 R2 Update Rollup 3 or later
trans-unit.target: Operations Manager 2012 R2 Update Rollup 3 or later

trans-unit.source: The following tables list the ports related to these tasks.
trans-unit.target: The following tables list the ports related to these tasks.

trans-unit.target: Some of the following resources mention Advisor.

trans-unit.source: However, the listed resources will change in the future.
trans-unit.target: However, the listed resources will change in the future.

trans-unit.source: Use the following procedures to register your Operations Manager management group with the Operational Insights service.
trans-unit.target: Use the following procedures to register your Operations Manager management group with the Operational Insights service.

trans-unit.source: If you are having communication problems between the management group and the Operational Insights service, use the validation procedures to troubleshoot data transmission to the Operational Insights service.
trans-unit.target: If you are having communication problems between the management group and the Operational Insights service, use the validation procedures to troubleshoot data transmission to the Operational Insights service.

trans-unit.source: Use the information from the first table presented previously to ensure that the resources needed for the Operations Manager management server are accessible through any firewalls you might have.
trans-unit.target: Use the information from the first table presented previously to ensure that the resources needed for the Operations Manager management server are accessible through any firewalls you might have.

trans-unit.source: Use the information from the second table presented previously to ensure that the resources needed for the Operations console in Operations Manager and Operational Insights are accessible through any firewalls you might have.
trans-unit.target: Use the information from the second table presented previously to ensure that the resources needed for the Operations console in Operations Manager and Operational Insights are accessible through any firewalls you might have.

trans-unit.source: If you use a proxy server with Internet Explorer, ensure that it is configured and works correctly.
trans-unit.target: If you use a proxy server with Internet Explorer, ensure that it is configured and works correctly.

trans-unit.source: To verify, you can open a secure web connection (https), for example <linkText>https://bing.com</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: To verify, you can open a secure web connection (https), for example <linkText>https://bing.com</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: If the secure web connection doesn’t work in a browser, it probably won’t work in the Operations Manager management console with web services in the cloud.
trans-unit.target: If the secure web connection doesn’t work in a browser, it probably won’t work in the Operations Manager management console with web services in the cloud.

trans-unit.source: Open the Operations Manager console and select the Administration workspace.
trans-unit.target: Open the Operations Manager console and select the Administration workspace.

trans-unit.source: Expand Operational Insights, and then select Operational Insights Connection.
trans-unit.target: Expand Operational Insights, and then select Operational Insights Connection.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Operations Manager Operational Insights Connection</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Operations Manager Operational Insights Connection</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the Operational Insights Connection view, click Configure Proxy Server.
trans-unit.target: In the Operational Insights Connection view, click Configure Proxy Server.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Operations Manager Operational Insights Connection Configure Proxy Server</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Operations Manager Operational Insights Connection Configure Proxy Server</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In Operational Insights Settings Wizard: Proxy Server, select Use a proxy server to access the Operational Insights Web Service, and then type the URL with the port number, for example, http://myproxy:80.
trans-unit.target: In Operational Insights Settings Wizard: Proxy Server, select Use a proxy server to access the Operational Insights Web Service, and then type the URL with the port number, for example, http://myproxy:80.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Operations Manager Operational Insights proxy address</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Operations Manager Operational Insights proxy address</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Proxy server credentials and settings need to propagate to managed computers that will report to Operational Insights.
trans-unit.target: Proxy server credentials and settings need to propagate to managed computers that will report to Operational Insights.

trans-unit.source: Those servers should be in the Microsoft System Center Advisor Monitoring Server Group.
trans-unit.target: Those servers should be in the Microsoft System Center Advisor Monitoring Server Group.

trans-unit.source: Credentials are encrypted in the registry of each server in the group.
trans-unit.target: Credentials are encrypted in the registry of each server in the group.

trans-unit.source: Open the Operations Manager console and select the Administration workspace.
trans-unit.target: Open the Operations Manager console and select the Administration workspace.

trans-unit.source: Under RunAs Configuration, select Profiles.
trans-unit.target: Under RunAs Configuration, select Profiles.

trans-unit.source: Open the System Center Advisor Run As Profile Proxy profile.
trans-unit.target: Open the System Center Advisor Run As Profile Proxy profile.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>image of the System Center Advisor Run As Proxy profile</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>image of the System Center Advisor Run As Proxy profile</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the Run As Profile Wizard, click Add to use a Run As account.
trans-unit.target: In the Run As Profile Wizard, click Add to use a Run As account.

trans-unit.source: You can create a new Run As account or use an existing account.
trans-unit.target: You can create a new Run As account or use an existing account.

trans-unit.source: This account needs to have sufficient permissions to pass through the proxy server.
trans-unit.target: This account needs to have sufficient permissions to pass through the proxy server.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>image of the Run As Profile Wizard</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>image of the Run As Profile Wizard</linkText>

trans-unit.source: To set the account to manage, choose A selected class, group, or object to open the Object Search box.
trans-unit.target: To set the account to manage, choose A selected class, group, or object to open the Object Search box.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>image of the Run As Profile Wizard</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>image of the Run As Profile Wizard</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Search for then select Microsoft System Center Advisor Monitoring Server Group.
trans-unit.target: Search for then select Microsoft System Center Advisor Monitoring Server Group.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>image of the Object Search box</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>image of the Object Search box</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Add a Run As account box image of the Run As Profile Wizard
trans-unit.target: Click OK to close the Add a Run As account box image of the Run As Profile Wizard

trans-unit.source: Complete the wizard and save the changes.
trans-unit.target: Complete the wizard and save the changes.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>image of the Run As Profile Wizard</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>image of the Run As Profile Wizard</linkText>

trans-unit.source: If you added solutions by using Operational Insights, you can view them in the Operations Manager console as management packs under Administration.
trans-unit.target: If you added solutions by using Operational Insights, you can view them in the Operations Manager console as management packs under Administration.

trans-unit.source: Search for System Center Advisor to quickly find them.
trans-unit.target: Search for System Center Advisor to quickly find them.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>management packs downloaded</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>management packs downloaded</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Or, You can also check for Operational Insights management packs by using the following Windows PowerShell commands in the Operations Manager management server:
trans-unit.target: Or, You can also check for Operational Insights management packs by using the following Windows PowerShell commands in the Operations Manager management server:

trans-unit.source: In the Operations Manager management server, open Performance Monitor (perfmon.exe), and select Performance Monitor.
trans-unit.target: In the Operations Manager management server, open Performance Monitor (perfmon.exe), and select Performance Monitor.

trans-unit.source: Click Add, and then select Health Service Management Groups.
trans-unit.target: Click Add, and then select Health Service Management Groups.

trans-unit.source: Add all the counters that start with HTTP.
trans-unit.target: Add all the counters that start with HTTP.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>add counters</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>add counters</linkText>

trans-unit.source: If your Operations Manager configuration is good, you will see activity for Health Service Management counters for events and other data items, based on the management packs that you added in Operational Insights and the configured log collection policy.
trans-unit.target: If your Operations Manager configuration is good, you will see activity for Health Service Management counters for events and other data items, based on the management packs that you added in Operational Insights and the configured log collection policy.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Performance Monitor showing activity</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Performance Monitor showing activity</linkText>
